/Title:/ MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI 'GREL PA RNAM GNYIS KYI DKA' GNAS
GSAL BAR BYED PA LEGS BSHAD SKA

LA BZANG KLU DBANG GI ROL MTSO, (DGA' LDAN PAR MA,)

mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel pa rnam gnyis kyi dka' gnas gsal bar
byed pa

legs bshad skal bzang klu dbang gi rol mtsho/ (dga' ldan par
ma/)

chos kyi bshes gnyen

@001A *, ,BSTAN BCOS MNGON BAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN 'GREL BA DANG
BCAS PA'I RNAM BSHAD RNAM PA GNYIS KYI DKA' BA'I GNAD GSAL BAR
BYED PA LEGS BSHAD SKAL BZANG KLU DBANG GI ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA
LAS SKABS DANG PO'I SKYI? DON BZHUGS SO,,

@001B [DR: *, ,RGYAL BA'I RGYAL TSANG MIR? MA CHOS SU ?,]

#, ,NA MO GU RU A'ARYA MEE TRA YE, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA'I MAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN 'GREL

PA DANG BCAS PA'I RGYA CHER BSHAD BA LEGS BSHAD GSER GYI PHRENG
BA ZHES BYA BA DANG RNAM BSHAD SNYING PO'I RGYAN CES BYA BA
GNYIS KYI DKA'

PA'I GNAD GSAL BAR BYED PA LEGS BSHAD SKAL BZANG KLU DBANG GI
ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA, BLA MA DANG RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA MGON PO'I

ZHABS LA GUS PA CHEN POS PHYAG 'TSAL ZHING SKYABS SU MCHI'O,
,BRTZE BA CHEN POS DUS THAMS CAD DU RJES SU GZUNG DU GSOL LO,,

[DR: *, ,RTEN 'BYUNG YANG? DANG DBANG ? MDZAD ? ]

[DR: *, ,?]

@002A [DR: *, ,RGYAL BA'I GRUB DON BSAL MDZAD MED ?]

*, ,RNAM MANG GDUL BYA'I KHAMS DANG BSAM PA KUN, ,RNAM KUN
MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN GYIS LEGS GZIGS NAS, ,RNAM GSUM CHOS KYI 'KHOR
LO BSKOR MDZAD PA,,

RNAM 'DREN THUB PA'I DBANG POR GUS PHYAG 'TSAL, ,RGYAL BA KUN
GYI MKHYEN BRTZE GCIG BSDUS PA, ,RGYAL SRAS THU BO SEMS DPA'I
TSUL BZUNG STE, ,RGYAL BA'I CHOS KYI SRID

LA DBANG BSGYUR BA, ,RGYAL TSAB DAM PA'I ZHABS LA GUS PAS 'DUD,
,GANG LA BRTEN NAS YUM DON RGYA MTSO YI, ,'JUG DOGS CHE DER BDE
BLAG GROL BA'I GRU, ,RGYAL YUM RGYAN

'DI GANG GI THUGS RJE YIS, ,'GRO LA SNANG MDZAD 'PHAGS PA THOGS
MED DANG, ,SANGS RGYAS GNYIS PAR RANG GRAGS DBYIG GI GNYEN, ,RAB
DGA'I SA THOB 'PHAGS PA RNAM

[DR: *, ,MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO CHOS KI RGYAL MTSAN RJE,,]

@002B GROL SDE, ,DE YIS RJES BZUNG BTZUN PA GROL SDE DANG,
,MCHOG SDE 'DUL BA'I SDE DANG RNAM SNANG MDZAD, ,SLOB DPON SENG
BZANG SANGS RGYAS YE SHES ZHABS, ,YON TAN BSHES GNYEN LO CHEN
RIN CHEN BZANG, ,ZLA BA BZANG PO DHI RAB LA DANG,,

BSTAN SKYONG 'BUM PHRAG GSUM BA RDOG LO'I ZHABS, ,'BRE AAR GZHON
NU TSUL KHRIMS SHES RAB 'BUM, ,BYANG CHUB 'BUM DANG GNYAL ZHIG
'JAM RDOR DANG, ,BZANG RING DAR TSUL BRTZON 'GRUS RDO RJE DANG,
,BO DONG RIN CHEN BRTZOM 'GRUS SENG GE

DANG; ;TSAD MA'I SKYES BU BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN, ,MKHAS PA
NYA DBON RJE BTZUN BDE MDA' BA, ,LA SOGS RGYA BOD MKHAS PA'I
SKYE BO LA, ,BDAG CAG SGO GSUM GUS PAS PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,KHYAD
PAR LUGS 'DIR BKA' DRIN MNYAM

MED PA'I, ,SKAD GNYIS SMRA BA KUN GYI MCHOG GYUR PA, ,RDOG LO
BSTAN BA'I NYI MKHU DBON LA, ,SGO GSUM GUS PA CHEN POS PHYAG
'TSAL LO, ,RGYAL BA'I BKA' DANG DGONGS 'GREL MKHAS PA'I GSUNG,
,SGRA DON JI BZHIN LEGS BSGYUR

GANGS CAN 'DIR, ,'GROL THAR PA'I LAM MCHOG GSAL MDZAD PA, ,SPRUL
BA'I CHOS RGYAL LO PAn RNAMS LA 'DUD, ,MDO RGYUD LUNG GI CHU
KHUR CIR YANG 'DZIN, ,DRI MED RIGS PA'I GLOG PHRENG DRAG TU
'KHYUG ,STONG NYID 'BRUG SGRA'I GAD RGYANGS

MTHON PO CAN, ,BLO BZANG DBYAR SKYES DBANG PO DE LA 'DUD, ,RGYAL
BA GNYIS BA'I RGYAL TSAB DAR MA'I ZHABS, ,MKHAS GRUB BSTAN PA'I
NYI MA DGE LEGS DPAL, ,GANGS CAN BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG DGE 'DUN
GRUB, ,KUN MKHYEN GNYIS PA CHOS

@003A *, ,'BYOR DPAL BZANG DANG, ,'JAM DBYANGS RNAM 'PHRUL CHOS
KYI RGYAL MTSAN ZHABS, ,DE SRAS MTHU BO DPAL 'BYOR RGYAL MTSAN
DANG, ,BKA' DRIN MNYAM MED BDE LEGS MTSAN CAN TE, ,LUGS 'DI'I
BRGYUD PA'I BLA MA RNAMS LA 'DUD,,

RANG NYID TSE RABS KUN TU 'DRIS PHYIR DANG, ,RANG DANG SKAL
MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA'I PHYIR, ,MDO RGYAN 'GREL PA'I RNAM
BSHAD RNAM GNYIS KYI, ,DKA' BA'I GNAD RNAMS GSAL BAR BYED PA YI,
,MDO DANG RTZA 'GREL SBYOR PA'I CHU GTER CHE,,

LEGS BSHAD YID BZHIN NOR BUS RAB TU GTAMS, ,SKAL BZANG KLU DBANG
DGA' BA'I RNAM 'GYUR GYIS, ,ROL BA'I MTSO CHEN BDAG GIS BRI BAR
BYA, ` ,DE LA 'DIR BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN 'DI
'CHAD PA LA,

BSTAN BCOS KYI SNGON DU 'GRO BA SBYOR BSHAD PA DANG, SKABS SU
BABS PA'I BSTAN BCOS DNGOS BSHAD PA GNYIS, DANG PO LA, RGYAN GYI
BSHAD BYA'I RTZA BA'I MDO NGOS GZUNG PA DANG, RGYAN GYIS MDO DON
JI LTAR BKRAL BA'I TSUL DANG, RGYAN LA 'GREL PA

JI LTAR BYUNG TSUL DANG, 'GREL PA GANG GI RJES SU 'BRANGS NAS
MNGON RTOGS RGYAN JI LTAR 'CHAD PA'I TSUL DANG BZHI LAS, DANG PO
NI, CHOS KYI RJE THUB PA'I DBANG PO DE NYID KYIS DANG BOR BYANG
CHUB MCHOG TU THUGS BSKYED, BAR DU BSKAL CHEN GRANGS MED

GSUM GYI TSOGS BSAGS, MTHAR MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR SANGS RGYAS TE,
'JIG TSOGS LA LTA BA'I RI BO NYI SHU MTHOL BRLING BAS NGOS KUN
NAS BSKOR ZHING MA RIG PA'I MUN PA STUG PO CAN, LTA BA NGAN PA
SNA TSOGS PA'I 'KHRI SHING GIS THAR PA'I LAM

@003B BSGRIBS LA, PHRA RGYAS KYI DUG GI LJON SHING SDUG BSNGAL
GYIS 'BRAS BU YID DU MI 'ONG BA STER BAS DKRIGS PA, SRID PA'I
CHU KLUNG CHEN POS YONGS SU 'KHYUD PA'I 'KHOR BA'I 'BROG DGON PA
CHEN PO LAS LUS CAN MTHA' DAG BSGRAL TE NYID KYIS SKU NYAMS SU

BSTAR BA'I 'BRAS BU MCHOG LA 'GOD PAR MDZAD NAS, SRID PA'I SDUG
BSNGAL BRGYA PHRAG GZHOM PA'I THABS SU SKAL BA DANG LDAN PA'I
GDUL BYA RNAMS LA CHOS JI SNYED CIG BKA' STZAL BA RNAMS KYI NANG
NAS CHES SHIN TU ZAB PA DANG LDAN PA NI RGYAL BA KUN GYI

BGROD PA GCIG PA'I LAM SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MDO
SDE RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID YIN TE, MDO LAS, SH'A RI'I BU CHOS THAMS
CAD RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU MNGON BAR RDZOGS BAR 'TSANG RGYA BAR
'TSAL BAS SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA BSLAB PAR BYA'O,,

ZHES DANG, MJUG YONGS SU GTAD PA'I LE'UR, KUN DGA' BO SHES RAB
KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA 'DI 'JIG RTEN NA JI SRID DU SPYOD PA DE
SRID DU DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA BZHUGS PAR RIG PAR BYA'O, ,KUN DGA'
BO DE SRID DU DE BZHIN GSHEGS PAS CHOS STON

PAR RIG PAR BYA'O, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DE RNAMS KYI NANG
NAS 'DI'I BSHAD BYA RTZA BA'I MDO LA SNGA RABS PA KHA CIG ,DE LA
YUM SRAS BCU BDUN DU YOD DE, YUM DRUG ,SRAS BCU GCIG TU YOD PA'I
PHYIR, YUM DRUG NI, 'BUM, NYI KHRI,

KHRI BRGYAD STONG PA, SHES RAB KHRI BA, BRGYAD STONG PA, MDO
SDUD PA RNAMS YIN LA, DE RNAMS LA YUM ZHES BRJOD PA'I RGYU MTSAN
YOD DE, DE RNAMS BRJOD BYA MNGON PAR RTOGS PA BRGYAD DU PHYE NAS
STON PA'I SHER PHYIN GYI MDO YIN PA'I RGYU MTSAN

@004A *, ,GYIS DE LTAR BRJOD PA'I PHYIR, SRAS BCU GCIG NI, SHER
PHYIN BDUN BRGYA PA, LNGA BRGYA PA, SUM BRGYA PA, TSUL BRGYA
LNGA BCU PA, LNGA BCU PA, SGO NYER LNGA PA, RAB RTZAL RNAM GNON
GYIS ZHUS PA, KO'U SHI KAS ZHUS PA, SHER

PHYIN YI GE NYUNG DU, SHER PHYIN YI GE GCIG MA, SHES RAB SNYING
PO RNAMS YIN LA, DE RNAMS LA SRAS ZHES BRJOD PA'I RGYU MTSAN YOD
DE, DE RNAMS BRJOD BYA MNGON PAR RTOGS PA BRGYAD DU PHYE NAS MI
STON PAR BRJOD BYA PHYOGS RE BA TZAM STON

PA'I SHER PHYIN GYI MDO YIN PA'I RGYU MCHAN KYIS DE LTAR BRJOD
PA'I PHYIR, ZHES ZER NA, SHER PHYIN GYI MDO LA BCU BDUN GYIS
GRANGS NGES BYED PA MI 'THAD DE, DE GRANGS NYUNG BA'I SKYON YANG
YOD, DE GRANGS MANG BA'I SKYON MANG YOD PA'I PHYIR,

DANG PO GRUB STE, SHER PHYIN NYI MA'I SNYING PO, ZLA BA'I SNYING
PO, KUN TU BZANG PO LAG NA RDO RJE, RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN GYIS
ZHUS PA RNAMS DER MA 'DUS PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA GRUB STE, KHRI
BRGYAD STONG PA LA LE'U GYA BDUN YOD PA'I MDO SDUD PA DE'I LE'U
KYA BZHI PA

YIN PAS, DE ZUR BAR 'DREN NA LE'U GZHAN RNAMS LA YANG MTSUNGS
PA'I PHYIR, AAR CHEN PO DANG PHYIS KYI MKHAS PA KHA CIG ,LUGS DE
BKAG NAS DE LA DGUR YOD DE, RGYAS PA'I RGYAS PA SHER PHYIN BAM
PO LNGA BRGYA PA, RGYAS PA'I 'BRING

BAM PO BZHIR RGYA PA, RGYAS PA'I BSDUS PA STONG PHRAG BRGYA PA,
'BRING GI RGYAS PA STONG PHRAG NYI SHU LNGA PA, 'BRING GI 'BRING
KHRI BRGYAD STONG PA, 'BRING GI BSDUS PA SHES RAB KHRI BA, BSDUS
PA'I RGYAS PA BRGYAD STONG PA, BSDUS PA'I 'BRING SHER PHYIN

@004B BAM PO BCO BRGYAD PA, BSDUS PA'I BSDUS PA MDO SDUD PA
RNAMS SU YOD PA'I PHYIR, ZHES ZER BA RIGS PA SNGA MAS KHEGS SO,
,KHO NA RE, MDO SDUD PA KHRI BRGYAD STOD PA'I NANG TSAN DU
GSUNGS PA LOTZTSA PA RNAMS KYIS GLEGS BAM BONG DU BSGYUR BA'I
TSE

BKOD PA YIN GYI, DE KHRI BRGYAD STOD PA'I NANG TSAN MA YIN TE,
BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS 'KHOR BZHI PO DE DAG YANG DAG PAR RAB TU
DGA' BAR MDZAD PA'I PHYIR, ZHES GSUNGS PA'I THAD KYI SDUD 'GREL
LAS, RGYAS PAR BSTAN ZIN PA'I RJES DE MA THAG NAS,

ZHES KHRI BRGYAD STONG PA LA SOGS PA GSUNGS ZIN PA'I RJES SU MDO
BSDUS PA GSUNGS PAR BSHAD PA'I PHYIR ZER NA MI 'THAD DE, DE LTAR
NA KHRI BRGYAD STONG PA LA SHLOO KA KHRI TSO GCIG DANG STONG
PHRAG BRGYAD MTSANG BAS LOTZTSA PA RNAMS SHLOO KA'I GRANGS TZAM
LA

YANG 'KHRUL BAR THAL BA'I SKYON YOD PA'I PHYIR, GZHAN YANG,
BSDUS PA LA GSUM DU 'BYED TSUL DE MI 'THAD DE, MDO BRGYAD STONG
BA LA BAM PO NYER BZHI YOD PAR MDO DE NYID LAS 'BYUNG BAS SKABS
'DIR BA MTSAD? LA MI MTHUN PA MED PA'I PHYIR, ` RANG

LUGS NI, YUM RGYAS 'BRING BSDUS GSUM PO 'DI NYID 'DI'I BSHAD BYA
RTZA BA'I MDO YIN TE, 'GREL PAR, RGYAL BA'I YUM RNAM PA GSUM
CHAR LAS KYANG BRJOD PAR BYA BA NYID DU BSTAN PA, ZHES DANG, LA
LA LAS DON GZHAN LAS TSIG ,GZHAN

LAS RNAM GRANGS MING GIS TE, ,MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS YUM KUN LAS,
,DON BSDUS DE TZAM SHES PAR BYA, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS
PA LA KHA CIG ,SHER PHYIN GYI MDO'I DGONGS 'GREL DU GYUR PA'I
SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED DE LA BZHI LA?

@005A *, ,YOD DE, RIGS TSOGS DRUG ,MNGON RTOGS RGYAN, BRGYAD
STONG DON BSDUS GZHUNG 'GREL GNOD 'JOMS RNAMS SU YOD PA'I PHYIR,
ZHES ZER, DE YANG MI 'THAD DE, BRGYAD STONG DON BSDUS KYIS THOGS
MED KYI RJES SU

'BRANGS NAS SHER PHYIN GYI MDO'I DGONGS PA 'GREL, GZHUD 'GREL
GNOD 'JOMS KYIS KLU SGRUB KYI RJES SU 'BRANGS NAS SHER PHYIN GYI
MDO'I DGONGS PA 'GREL PA'I PHYIR, DANG PO GRUB STE, BRGYAD STONG
DON BSDUS LAS, SHES RAB PHA ROL

PHYIN PA NI, ,BSTAN PA GSUM LA YANG DAG BRTEN, ,BRTAGS PA DANG
NI GZHAN DBANG DANG, ,YONGS SU GRUB PA KHO NA'O, ,MED CES BYA LA
SOGS TSIG GIS, ,BRTAGS PA THAMS CAD 'GOG PAR BYED, ,SGYU MA LA
SOGS DPE RNAMS KYIS, ,

GZHAN GYI DBANG NI YANG DAG BSTAN, ,RNAM PAR BYANG BA BZHI YIS
NI, ,YONGS SU GRUB PA RAB TU BSGRAGS, ,SHES RAB PHA ROL PHYIN
PAR NI, ,SANGS RGYAS RNAMS KYIS GZHAN BSTAN MED, ,CES NGO BO
NYID GSUM GYI MDO 'GREL THEG BSDUS SOGS

THOGS MED KYI GZHUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN DU BSHAD PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS
PA GRUB STE, GNOD 'JOMS SOGS SU STONG NYID BCU DRUG GI BSHAD PA
BYED PA'I TSE RTZA? SHE'I LUNG DRANGS NAS BSHAD PA MDZAD PA'I
PHYIR, DE YANG SLOB DPON PHYOGS GLENG GIS BRGYAD

STONG PA'I DON TSAN SO GNYIS SU BSDUS NAS STON PA LA BRGYAD
STONG DON BSDUS MDZAD PA YIN TE, SO GNYIS NI, DE NYID LAS, RTEN
DANG DBANG DU BYA BA DANG, ,LAS NI SGOM PA DANG BCAS PA, ,RAB
DBYE RTAGS DANG LTUNG BA DANG, ,PHAN YON BCAS

@005B PAR YANG DAG BRJOD, ,CES GSUNGS PA LTAR, RAB DBYE LA STONG
NYID BCU DRUG ,SGOM PA LA RNAM G-YENG GI RTOG PA BCU'I GNYEN POR
BCU, RTEN, DBANG DU BYA BA, LAS, RTAGS, LTUNG BA, PHAN YON DANG
DRUG RNAMS SO, ,DE LA RTEN NI STON PA'O, ,DBANG

DU BYA BA NI BYANG SEMS DANG NYAN THOS KYI 'KHOR RO, ,LAS NI YUM
LA JI LTAR SPYOD PA'O, ,RTAGS NI BDUD LAS DANG PHYIR MI LDOG
PA'I RTAGS SO, ,LTUNG PA NI SHER PHYIN SPANGS NA NGAN SONG DU
SKYE BA'O, ,PHAN YON NI STONG GSUM RIN PO CHE SNA BDUN GYIS
BKANG

NAS BYIN PA BAS SHER PHYIN 'BRI BA SOGS BSOD NAMS CHE BA'O, ,'O
NA GZHUNG 'GREL GNOD 'JOMS DE GANG GIS MDZAD CE NA, 'DI LA YUM
GSUM GYI GZHUNG 'GREL GNOD 'JOMS ZHES PA YE SHES SDES BSGYUR BA
ZHIG DANG, 'BUM RKYANG BA'I GZHUNG

'GREL GNOD 'JOMS ZHES PA 'GYUR BYANG MED BA ZHIG YOD PA'I PHYI
MA RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS MDZAD PA YIN TE, 'PHANG
THANG GI DKAR CHAG TU, BTZAN PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS MDZAD
PA'I 'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA 'BUM GYI RGYA

CHER 'GREL, ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DANG PO DE LA MI MTHUN PA
MANG DU 'BYUNG YANG, SNGA MA RNAMS LA KHA CHE MCHE BA'I SDES
MJAD PAR GRAGS PA LTAR YIN NA MA SNYAM STE DPYAD PAR BYA'O, ,DES
NA YUM RGYAS 'BRING GNYIS KHRI BRGYAD STONG PA DANG GSUM GYI

RGYA CHER BSHAD PA GZHUNG 'GREL GNOD 'JOMS KYIS SGO GSUM DANG
RNAM GRANGS BCU GCIG GI SGO NAS YUM 'GREL PAR BYED PA YIN LA, DE
LA SGO GSUM NI, GLENG GZHI'I SKABS PHYE BA'I RJES LA SH'A RI'I
BU LA, ZHES PA NAS BRTZON PAR BYA'O, ,ZHES PA'I 

@006A *, ,BAR GYIS MGO SMOS PAS GO BA RNAMS LA GANG GIS GANG GI
PHYIR GANG LA JI LTAR SLOB TSUL BZHI STON PA BSDUS TE BSTAN PA'I
SGO, DE NAS RNAM MKHYEN RDZOGS PA'I BAR GYIS RNAM PAR SPROS NAS
GO BA RNAMS LA RNAM MKHYEN LAS

BRTZAMS TE, RNAM PAR MI RTOG PA'I SHER PHYIN BZUNG NAS DON DAM
PA'I TSUL DU STON PA 'BRING DU BSTAN PA'I SGO, DE NAS YONGS SU
RDZOGS PA'I BAR GYIS DRANGS DGOS PA'AM, TSIG LA 'CHEL BA RNAMS
KYI DON DU LAM SHES LAS BRTZAMS TE, RNAM

PAR RTOG PA DANG BCAS PA DANG RNAM PAR MI RTOG PA'I SHER PHYIN
BZUNG NAS KUN RDZOB DANG DON DAM PA'I TSUL DU BSTAN PA RGYAS PAR
BSHAD BA'I SGO'O, ,RNAM GRANGS BCU GCIG NI DANG POR SH'A RI'I BU
LA BKA' STZAL NAS BSHAD PA'I RNAM GRANGS

GCIG GO ,DE NAS RAB 'BYOR GYIS RGYAS PAR BSHAD PA NI GNYIS PA'O,
,DE NAS BRGYA BYIN DANG, DE NAS RAB 'BYOR DANG, BYAMS PA DANG,
RAB 'BYOR DANG, BRGYA BYIN DANG, RAB 'BYOR DANG, BYAMS PA DANG,
RAB 'BYOR DANG, DE NAS KUN

DGA' BO LA BKA' STZAL NAS YONGS SU GTAD PA'O, ` ,RANG LUGS LA
SHER PHYIN GYI MDO'I DGONGS 'GREL DU GYUR PA'I SHING RTA'I SROL
'BYED DE LA GNYIS SU YOD DE, MGON PO KLU SGRUB KYIS JI LTAR
BKRAL BA'I TSUL DANG,

RJE BTZUN BYAMS MGON GYIS JI LTAR BKRAL BA'I TSUL GNYIS SU YOD
PA'I PHYIR, GSER PHRENG LAS, DNGOS BSTAN STONG NYID KYI DON RIGS
TSOGS DRUG DANG, SHUGS BSTAN STONG NYID BSHAD PA NA GDUL BYA'I
RGYUD LA MNGON RTOGS SKYE BA'I

@006B RIM PA RNAMS RGYAN GYIS BKRAL BAS, RJE BTZUN DANG KLU
SGRUB ZHABS GNYIS KYIS SHER PHYIN 'GREL TSUL GNYIS SU BYUNG NGO,
,ZHES BYA BAR YANG GNAS SO, ,ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, DE LA DANG
PO NI, RGYAL BA MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS TSUL BSTAN NAS LO

BZHI BRGYA LON PA NA, RGYAL BA'I MDO RGYUD DU MA NAS LUNG BSTAN
PA'I SHING RTA CHEN PO DPAL MGON 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB DE NYID
'JIG RTEN DU BYON NAS, SHER PHYIN GYI MDO'I DNGOS BSTAN STONG
NYID KYI RIM PA DE NYID RIGS PA'I RNAM GRANGS MTHA' YAS

PA'I SGO NAS GTAN LA 'BEBS PA LA RIGS TSOGS DRUG DANG, DE KHO NA
NYID LUNG GI SGO NAS GTAN LA 'BEBS PA LA MDO KUN LAS BTUS PA
MDZAD DO, ,KLU SGRUB LUNG BSTAN TSUL YOD DE, LANG GSHEGS LAS,
LHO PHYOGS BE TA'I YUL DU NI, ,DGE

SLONG DPAL LDAN ZHES GRAGS PA, ,DE MING KLU ZHES 'BOD PA DES,
,YOD DANG MED PA'I PHYOGS 'JIG PA, ,NGA YI BSTAN PA 'JIG RTEN
DU, ,BLA MED THEG CHEN RAB BSHAD NAS, ,RAB TU DGA' BA'I SA
BSGRUBS TE, ,BDE BA CAN DU DE 'GRO'O, ,ZHES

GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR, RIGS TSOGS DRUG PO DE GANG ZHE NA, 'DI LA YUL
RTEN 'BYUNG GI DE KHO NA NYID GTAN LA 'BEBS PA'I GZHUNG BZHI,
YUL CAN STONG NYID RTOGS PA'I LTA BA THAR PA THOB PA'I LAM GYI
RTZA BAR STON PA'I GZHUNG GNYIS LAS, DANG PO

LA YANG, DGAG BYA BDEN GRUB GTZO BOR 'GOG PA'I GZHUNG GNYIS,
BDEN PAR MED KYANG BYA BYED 'THAD TSUL STON PA'I GZHUNG GNYIS
LAS, DANG PO GNYIS YOD DE, DNGOS SMRA BA RNAMS KYI GANG ZAG DANG
CHOS KYI BDAG TU SGRO 'DOGS PA'I BSGRUB

@007A *, ,BYA BDEN DNGOS 'GOG PA RTZA SHE DANG, DE'I SGRUB BYED
RTOG GE'I TSIG DON BCU DRUG 'GOG PA ZHIB MO RNAM 'THAG GNYIS SU
MDZAD PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA GNYIS YOD DE, RAB BYED BDUN PAR SKYE
GNAS 'JIG GSUM BRTAG

PA LAS 'PHROS NAS BDEN PAR MED KYANG BYA BYED 'THAD TSUL SPYIR
STON PA STONG NYID BDUN CU PA DANG, RAB BYED DANG POR RKYEN
BRTAG PA LAS 'PHROS NAS BDEN PAR MED KYANG DGAG SGRUB KYI RNAM
GZHAG 'THAD TSUL STON PA LA RTZOD BZLOG MDZAD

PA'I PHYIR, GNYIS PA LA, RIN CHEN PHRENG BA DANG, RIGS PA DRUG
CU PA GNYIS MDZAD PA YIN TE, 'JUG PA'I RGYA CHER 'GREL LAS, BDEN
GNYIS KYI TSUL DE LTAR DU RTOGS PA NI SANGS RGYAS THOB PA LTA CI
SMOS 'KHOR BA LAS GROL BA LA YANG MED

MI RUNG NGO ZHES GZHUNG GNYIS KYIS STON PAS, ZHES DANG, 'KHOR BA
LAS GROL BA LA YOD MED KYI MTHAR LTA BA SPANGS PA'I LAM DGOS PA
NI GZHUNG GZHAN GNYIS KYIS STON TE, ZHES GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR,
GNYIS PA NI, THUB PA CHEN PO CHOS KYI

DBYINGS SU SNYOMS PAR ZHUGS PA'I CHUL BSTAN NAS LO DGU BRGYA LON
PA NA, THOGS MED SKU MCHED 'JIG RTEN DU BYON LA, DE YANG SLOB
DPON 'PHAGS PA THOGS MED CES BYA BA SNGON RGYAL BA DU MA LA LHAG
PAR BYA BA BYAS SHING DGE BA'I RTZA BA

RGYA CHEN PO BSKYED PA, DA LTA YANG SANGS RGYAS DANG BYANG CHUB
